Entries.RequestBody:
{
  "properties": {
    "policyContent": "<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<policies>
    <inbound>
        <find-and-replace from="aaa" to="BBB" />
        <set-header name="ETag" exists-action="skip">
            <value>bbyby</value>
            <!-- for multiple headers with the same name add additional value elements -->
        </set-header>
        <set-query-parameter name="additional" exists-action="append">
            <value>xxbbcczc</value>
            <!-- for multiple parameters with the same name add additional value elements -->
        </set-query-parameter>
        <cross-domain />
    </inbound>
    <outbound />
</policies>",
    "contentFormat": "xml"
  }
}

Entries.RequestBody:
{
  "properties": {
    "policyContent": "<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<policies>
    <inbound>
        <rate-limit calls="5" renewal-period="60" />
        <quota calls="100" renewal-period="604800" />
        <base />
    </inbound>
    <outbound>
        <base />
    </outbound>
</policies>",
    "contentFormat": "xml"
  }
}

Entries.RequestBody:
{
  "properties": {
    "policyContent": "<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<policies>
    <inbound>
        <base />
        <cache-lookup vary-by-developer="false" vary-by-developer-groups="false" downstream-caching-type="none">
            <vary-by-query-parameter>version</vary-by-query-parameter>
            <vary-by-header>Accept</vary-by-header>
            <vary-by-header>Accept-Charset</vary-by-header>
        </cache-lookup>
    </inbound>
    <outbound>
        <cache-store duration="10" />
        <base />
    </outbound>
</policies>",
    "contentFormat": "xml"
  }
}
